chatshot.shadow.description: Whether the image of the chat should have text shadow or not.
chatshot.scale.description: The scale of the text in the image.
chatshot.tooltip.description: Whether a tooltip showing the controls should be shown when hovering over the copy button.
chatshot.copyMessage.description: Whether a message should be sent confirming the text or image was copied successfully.
chatshot.clickAction.description: What clicking the copy button should do.
chatshot.shiftClickAction.description: What clicking the copy button while holding shift should do.
chatshot.saveImage.description: Save the image of the chat you made to .minecraft/screenshots/chat
